summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Application for quotation of new securities (existing class)  
- **Securities Issued**: 277,778 ordinary fully paid shares (YUG)  
- **Issue Date**: 01/08/2025  
- **Issue Price**: AUD 0.02 per share (cash consideration)  
- **Source**: Conversion of options (YUGAH, expiring 02-Jul-2028, exercise price AUD 0.02)  
- **Post-Issue Capital**:  
  - **Quoted**: 235,722,225 ordinary shares (YUG)  
  - **Unquoted**:  
    - 41,933,962 options (YUGAH)  
    - 34,835,000 performance rights (YUGAG)  
    - 750,000 options (YUGAE, expiring 01-Apr-2026, exercise price AUD 0.30)  
    - 1,725,000 restricted options (YUGAD, expiring 15-Oct-2025)  

*-- No material trading or capital impact beyond standard conversion of options --*
